name: Step 1 - Login to Qualtrics
description: Login to Qualtrics (click link in header)
Click on 'BA Grant Project' to navigate to project page

name: Step 2 - Navigate to Data & Analysis
description: This is the page when you can edit the screener
For more information visit the qualtrics support pages (link in footer)
To view and export collect data, click on the 'Data & Analysis' tab

name: Step 3 - Viewing collected responses
description: This is the page when you can view and download the data
To change the columns you can preview, click on 'Tools' and then 'Choose Columns

name: Step 4 - Downloading collected responses
description: To download the responses into excel, click 'Export and Import' and then 'Export data...'

name: Step 4 - Downloading excel file
description: Use the default tab to download as 'csv' file
Keep 'Download all fields' selected. (You will need to remove the contact fields from the download manually)
Select 'Use Numerical Values'
Click 'Download' to download

name: Step 5 - Editing columns
description: Open the downloaded excel file
Delete the columns containing personally identifying information
These are: 'Status', 'IPAddress', 'LocationLatitude', 'LocationLongitude', 'name' and 'email'
The responses can still be identified using the 'id' (and as a back up by logging onto Qualtrics)

name: Step 6 - Updating sharepoint data
description: Open the 'Qualtrics Export' file on SharePoint in '2020 Data' under 'qualtrics'
Identify the timepoint of your last update and find this row in the new download
Copy and paste data below this point into the sharepoint file (columns in grey are manually added)
Ensure the data fields match up (if not you have probably not deleted enough columns)

The 'id' column is a direct copy of the 'id' field from Qualtrics (FYI those in red are abbrievated from the ResponseID as these participants completed Qualtrics prior to adding of the participant generated id question)
The 'ID' and Condition' need adding in once participant has attended the lab session
